text: Don't Grieve (; ) is a 1969 Georgian comedy-drama movie directed by Georgiy Daneliya and was based on the novel My Uncle Benjamen by Claude Tillier. It stars Sergo Zakariadze, Vakhtang Kikabidze, Sofiko Chiaureli, Gogi Kavtaradze, Zurab Kapianidze. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 comedy-drama movies Category:Georgian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Georgiy Daneliya
title: Don't Grieve
